name: doctorother
text: This is exactly why I love Beef.  Even to the end, he is ready to hypothesize.

name: mrectomy
text: That's our Beef.

name: afastidioushat
text: I question we've all posed at least once in our lives.

name: afastidioushat
text:
I meant to say "A question..."

I am dumb.

name: nickstraightup
text: A comment left by nickstraightup was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, featurelessvoid, Unfun, michellemarie, Boyd, DickLaurent, Darthemed)

name: exhumed
text: Perhaps A am dumb?

name: shmuckeles
text: y'know i really don't think that it is, but he went and proved me wrong. i guess we need more science

name: deimosrising
text: The Butterball hotline people are really very helpful.

name: catachresis
text: This is even better than Martin Sheen as the US President on the phone to the Butterball Hotline.

name: tinhand
text: I imagine Rose on the other end to look like Rose from 2 and a half men

name: erinye
text: I imagine Rose from Golden Girls.

name: erinye
text: I'm the girl who sucks.

name: deovalente
text:
Plus you got depression, I assume.

Also, I hovered over your icon and it said "Strips Viewed: 666" Hee hee! Oh hee hee!

name: erinye
text:
Not anymore. I should have just stopped there, but that would have made me sad.

(I have actually read the entirety of the archives previously, but without being logged in. I need the Assetbar accolades, damnit. VALIDATION)

name: deovalente
text: I am in a similar situation.  I mean, as far as reading the archives and then desiring validation, not so much being the girl who sucks, although I feel for you.

name: wulvaine
text:
I actually read through every single strip, beginning to end, reading all the alt texts, and I somehow did not know that I could click on the strips to get into a comments section where I could be registered as a member.

I am indeed the guy who sucks. So now I'm doing a brand new archive crawl.

name: tonyhighwind
text: We've all been there, Calvin.  Or at least I have.

name: zathyr
text: I've been reading though the archives and this is the comment that made me register.  IT MADE ME!

name: erinye
text:
I'm... so proud!

*snif*

(Also, I apologize in advance.)

name: lucid
text: And history repeats itself. I even bought the books, but decided to read through again with the alt text and comments. It is a part of the experience.

name: tangles
text: when i came by and looked at this much later, it was 1377! oh, tee hee indeed

name: wite_rabit
text: I think the number you're going for there is 1337.

name: shoinan
text: I understand why he called Rose, Google does not offer good answers to this question.

name: tombsgrave
text: Next week on Science Get: Testing commences.

name: greymantledwolf
text: a question for the ages.

name: 1000hz
text:
Hey BEEF! You openin' one eye all funky in panel 7.

How come?

name: featurelessvoid
text: Because he's had all kinds of Cuervo .

name: dracer2
text: I do this even after only one kind of Cuervo

name: blarghamagarky
text:
I imagine he is trying to stare into the electrical socket
to see if it has the answer to whether or not it will shoot electricity through his puke into his heart

name: blarghamagarky
text: also yea all kinds of Cuervo

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
This exact, horrible thing happened to a guy I knew in H.S. He was a Power Company lineman, and went up with the flu on a nasty night.


I am glad this is in archives.

name: cdl146
text: While I don't know the answer to this one, I do know that if you puke on your heater it will stink something fierce for days.

name: gournal
text: dear god

name: zoe
text: What we need more if is science

name: dirtyonethirty
text: Roast Beef is a quality friend.

name: waldo913
text: Doesn't *everyone* have the butterball turkey hotline rememberized?  I know I do...

name: stormagnet
text: ... now.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
I know perspective is shifting from panel to panel, but I like to pretend that Beef is just rolling back and forth listlessly on the phone.
"Ugh, my stomach is hell of sour if I lay like that. *flip* Ugh, my stomach is hell of sour when I lay like this. *flip* Ugh, Rose, that's a nice name, maybe Rose knows."
*flip*

name: cailetshadow
text: this comment is a delicious valu-add to this strip. thank you.

name: zeal
text: I'd always read it as Beef rolling around on the floor before.  Never realized the perspective kept shifting.

name: heccibiggs
text: Yeah, same here. Just rolling around, contemplating the electrical outlet.

name: d-pad
text: That's how I've always seen it, and by God that's how it's gonna stay in my mind. It adds a certain charm to it.

name: tekende
text: Speaking of perspective, I find panel six to be extremely questionable.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Wow. Yeah.

Huh.

name: random_shorts
text: Panel six is all foreshadowing Roast Beef's quandry.

name: quantumcasaba
text: All kinds of scotch, but I've no motivation to puke into an outlet for the new year. Perhaps if I had a friend in hell.

name: lexsenthur
text:
How was your day Rose?
A man called and then killed himself. It was not a super day.

name: drago25
text:
I love him just having one eye open in panel 7.
and I'm wondering what kind of party one would need to have for puking into an electrical outlet to become a possibility. I want to have this party

name: canusdivinus
text: I think we all have had a time where we call someone with our eyes closed. Those are probably the most important calls of our lives, whether or not we knot it.

name: canusdivinus
text: crap crap crap. KNOW it. KNOW W W W IT.

name: zedpower
text:
Once I wondered if wedging my head in the corner of a wall behind a door would make it so someone opening the door would cause my skull to crack open like a nutshell.

Fortunately no one else was home that day so I still don't know.

name: sex_bicycle
text: i have fallen asleep like that behind a door (obviously after one too many vodkas) and it didn't crack my head i slept through a good few people walking in and out of the room

name: daidai
text:
Wait wait. Has anyone tried this yet?

Like, calling Butterball, not pukeicide.

I might just do this because I have to see the response I will get.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Did you ever think that you might be delaying a person with a genuinely pressing call about a turkey, you prick?

name: woodenteeth
text: The little red button has popped up and I don't know what to do - I'M GOING FUCKING CRAZY HERE RIGHT NOW!

name: kamiikoneko
text: I am not really sure why I laughed so hard at the last panel.  I guess just the fact that he has obviously been thinking about it all night, tortured by the decision enough to call someone.

name: jonmw
text: I love it. Beef uses the tools immediately available to him to MacGyver his way to Hell.

name: rheabird13
text: 1-800-BUTTERBALL

name: punkmonkey
text: Rose is inquisitive AND insightful.

name: greenkoolayd
text: they should do a mythbusters about this.

name: serious_man
text: the eyes remind me of paul who is a ghost
